name: Hoi An Eco Travel: Hoi An Boat Trip to Traditional Villages
description:
Hoi An Eco Travel: Hoi An Boat Trip to Traditional Villages
Departure Time: 08:00
Duration: ½ day 
Tour Runs:Minimum 2 persons.Maximum on request

Hoi An tours with a lot of traditional village such as: Kim Bong Village, Thanh Ha Pottery village…From the port, we will depart for Thanh Ha Pottery Village where you can learn and enjoy the daily life of Thanh Ha people.
